channel.title: Interactivity
channel.description: A blog that talks about the two main types of interactivity in video games

item.title: Spyridwn Politis (p2020104) Blog
item.description:
In video games the main forms of interaction that a player can have are 2d and 3d graphics. The difference between them is that in 2d graphics the user exists only in the x, y (length and height), while in the 3d the z axis is added where the depth is.

Tags: interactivity, 2d, 3d, graphics, kiss-linux, blog
item.dc:creator: p2020104 Spyridwn Politis
